summary: Provides a data class representing an oligonucleotide design, storing its base sequence, melting temperature, penalty score, genomic span, and optional metadata such as name and 5' tail. Includes methods to compute length, homopolymer and dinucleotide run metrics, create derived oligos with added tails or names, and serialize/deserialize collections to text files.
business_intent: Support primer and probe design workflows by offering a convenient, analyzable, and persistable representation of oligos for bioinformatics pipelines and assay development.
